Posts.Content:
Hi,
My cousin who lives abroad is suffering with stage 4 BC. Doctors mentioned that there is no hope in her case. Can someone guide us how to go abt it to help her.
like-
Doctors Info in US- who have treated such cases
whom to contact for help?
Is it possible to get online consultation?
Thanks in advance.
-Kay
Posts.Title: Need doctors Info for stage4 bc
